messages.content: ComfyUI FrameMaker creates a sequence of frames by moving and scaling a subject image over a background image.
What are the basic workflows of ComfyUI FrameMaker?
There are three basic workflows of ComfyUI FrameMaker: frame_maker_basic, frame_maker_batch, and layerdiffusion frame_maker. These workflows can be found in the `workflows` directory.
What is the recommended extension for using with ComfyUI FrameMaker?
The recommended extension is ComfyUI-Manager which can be used to manage multiple custom nodes and workflows.
How do I install ComfyUI FrameMaker?
To install ComfyUI FrameMaker, clone its repository into your custom_nodes directory using the command `cd custom_nodes && git clone https://github.com/diStyApps/ComfyUI_FrameMaker.git`.
What is the contact email for ComfyUI FrameMaker?
You can contact the creator of ComfyUI FrameMaker at distty@gmail.com for any queries or feedback.
